# Shioaji

> Shioaji is provided by SinoPac the most pythonic API for trading the Taiwan and global financial market. You can use your favorite Python packages such as NumPy, pandas, PyTorch or TensorFlow to build your trading model with integrated the Shioaji API on cross-platform.

## Usage documentation

- [商品檔](https://sinotrade.github.io/zh/tutor/contract/index.md)
- [使用限制](https://sinotrade.github.io/zh/tutor/limit/index.md)
- [登入](https://sinotrade.github.io/zh/tutor/login/index.md)
- [模擬模式](https://sinotrade.github.io/zh/tutor/simulation/index.md)
- [銀行餘額](https://sinotrade.github.io/zh/tutor/accounting/account_balance/index.md)
- [Account portfolio](https://sinotrade.github.io/zh/tutor/accounting/account_portfolio/index.md)
- [保證金](https://sinotrade.github.io/zh/tutor/accounting/margin/index.md)

- [已實現損益](https://sinotrade.github.io/zh/tutor/accounting/profit_loss/index.md)
